mapper.sql:
SELECT role_id, role_name, role_key, role_sort, data_scope, menu_check_strictly, dept_check_strictly, status, create_time remark FROM sys_role
AND role_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.roleName}, '%')
AND role_key LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.roleKey}, '%')
AND status = #{param.status}
AND del_flag = '0'
ORDER BY role_sort ASC
mapper.select: SELECT sr.role_id, sr.role_name, sr.role_key FROM sys_role sr JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sr.role_id = sur.role_id WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT role_id, role_name, role_key, role_sort, data_scope, menu_check_strictly, dept_check_strictly, status, create_time FROM sys_role WHERE role_id = #{roleId} AND del_flag = '0'
SELECT DISTINCT r.role_key FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.del_flag = '0' AND r.status = '0' AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT DISTINCT ur.user_id FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = ur.user_id WHERE u.del_flag = '0' AND ur.role_id = #{roleId}
